message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.DC, cs.NI. 

The paper deals with storage systems and their ability to serve requests for files. This involves information theory (cs.IT) as well as distributed systems (cs.DS) and networked information systems (cs.NI). The use of erasure coding also suggests a focus on coding theory (cs.IT) and distributed computing (cs.DC). Finally, the algorithmic approach to maximizing request rates suggests a focus on optimization (cs.SI).
